Recently new sources of data have become available consisting of thousands of vertical profiles of these parameters each year, obtained through 'Citizen Science' and 'Community Science' programs. The successful applicant will use MATLAB to examine this data, correct problems with it, update and expand a web atlas (sogdatacentre.ca/atlas/) and use it to increase our understanding of the Strait's changing climate. Job Requirements A knowledge of oceanography is preferred but not essential. Familiarity with statistical methods and MATLAB programming skills are required.
